text:
Treatment Options By Stage
		            
		                
		                    Stage I Ovarian Germ Cell Tumors
		                    Treatment depends on whether the tumor is a dysgerminoma or another type of ovarian germ cell tumor.    Treatment of dysgerminoma may include the following:          -  Unilateral salpingo-oophorectomy with or without lymphangiography or CT scan.     - Unilateral salpingo-oophorectomy followed by observation.     - Unilateral sal
